fields.name: RPN
fields.description: DIRU Register Page Number (within its NRR)

fields.name: NRRI
fields.description:
Identifier of the Ncore 3 Register Region
in which this DIRU resides

fields.name: NUnitId
fields.description: Ncore 3 Unit identifier.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: Valid
fields.description:
Value of 1 validates this register. This bit
is set to 1 if the DIRU is implemented.

fields.name: FUnitId
fields.description: Fabric Unit Identifier of the unit

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: TransActv
fields.description: This bit is set when there is one or more active transactions inside the DIRU.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

registers.name: DIRUSFMCR
registers.description: DIRU Snoop Filter Maintenance Control Register
registers.csrDescription: DIRU Snoop Filter Maintenance Control Register

fields.name: InitSnoopFilter
fields.description: Toggle the bit to start snoop filter intilaization.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrDetEn
fields.description: If this bit is set, then correctable error detection and logging is enabled; otherwise, correctable error detection and logging is disabled.

fields.name: ErrIntEn
fields.description: If this bit is set, the Correctable Error Interrupt output signal is asserted when the number of correctable errors corrected equals the value in ErrThreshold field; otherwise, the correctable error interrupt signal is never asserted.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrThreshold
fields.description: This field determines the number of correctable errors that must be corrected before the Correctable Error Interrupt output signal is asserted.

fields.name: Rsvd2
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: If this bit is set, Error information is logged in status and location registers. Writing a one to the Correctable Error Valid bit clears the Correctable Error Valid bit.

fields.name: ErrCountOverflow
fields.description: This bit indicates that the number of correctable errors detected by the unit overflowed the Correctable Error Count field

fields.name: ErrCount
fields.description: This field indicates the number of correctable errors detected by the unit. The field stops incrementing if the Correctable Error Count Overflow bit is set

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description:
This field indicates the logged error type, if the Correctable Error Valid bit is set.
0x01: Snoop filter memory correctable error

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description:
This field indicates additional information about logged error type, if the Correctable Error Valid bit is set.
Bits 7:0 represents the way number.
Bits 14:8 repesents the snoop filter number.
Bit 15 represents the security bit.

fields.name: ErrAddr
fields.description: This field contains the low-order address bits of the transaction that encountered the error

fields.name: ErrAddr
fields.description: This field contains the high-order address bits of the transaction that encountered the error

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

registers.name: DIRUCESAR
registers.description: DIRU Correctable Error Status Alias Register
registers.csrDescription: DIRU Correctable Error Status Alias Register

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error valid filed of xCESR

fields.name: ErrCountOverflow
fields.description: Alias bit for ssetting Error Count Overflow field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrCount
fields.description: Alias field for setting error Count field of xCESR

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error type field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: Alias bit for setting errro info field of xCESR

fields.name: TransErrDetEn
fields.description: Concerto Transport error detect enable: When set, errors will be detected from the Concerto Transport.

fields.name: MemErrDetEn
fields.description: Memory protection error detection enable: When set,errors will be detected from any RAM memory arrays.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: TransErrIntEn
fields.description: Concerto Transport error interrupt enable: When set, errors will be detected from the Concerto Transport.

fields.name: MemErrIntEn
fields.description: Memory protection error interrupt enable: When set, errors will be detected from any RAM memory arrays.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: If this bit is set, Error information is logged in status and location registers. Writing a one to the Correctable Error Valid bit clears the Correctable Error Valid bit.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description:
This field indicates the logged error type, if the Uncorrectable Error Valid bit is set.
0x00: Snoop filter memory uncorrectable error
0x01: Transport error: wrong target ID.

fields.name: Rsvd2
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description:
This field indicates additional information about logged error type, if the Uncorrectable Error Valid bit is set.
If it is a snoop filter unncorrectable then
Bits 7:0 represents the way number.
Bits 14:8 repesents the snoop filter number.
Bit 15 represents the security bit.
If it is a tansport error then 
Bits 15:0 represent initiator ID

fields.name: ErrAddr
fields.description: This field contains the low-order address bits of the transaction that encountered the error

fields.name: ErrAddr
fields.description: This field contains the high-order address bits of the transaction that encountered the error

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

registers.name: DIRUUESAR
registers.description: DIRU Uncorrectable Error Status Alias Register
registers.csrDescription: DIRU Uncorrectable Error Status Alias Register

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error valid filed of xUESR

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error type field of xUESR

fields.name: Rsvd2
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: Alias bit for setting errro info field of xUESR

fields.name: ResThreshold
fields.description: Threshold for the uncorrectable error indication to the functional safety controller.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: EngVerId
fields.description: Engineering Version Identifier

fields.name: ImplVer
fields.description: Implementation Version

fields.name: UT
fields.description: Unit Type

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: Valid
fields.description: Implemented

fields.name: DIGId
fields.description: This bit is the identifier  of the DCE Interleaving Group to which this region will be mapped

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: HUI
fields.description: This bit indicates the Home unit identifier of the access

fields.name: Rsvd2
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: Size
fields.description: This field indicates a binary number from 0 to 31 from which the reqion's Size is calculated as (Size of IG) * 2 ^(Size +12) bytes

fields.name: Rsvd3
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: HUT
fields.description: This bit indicates the Home Unit Type- 0: System Memory, 1:Peripheral Storage

fields.name: Valid
fields.description: This bit indicates if the region is vcalid - 0: Invalid mapping, 1:Valid region mapping

fields.name: DIGId
fields.description: This bit is the identifier  of the DCE Interleaving Group to which this region will be mapped
